A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: How in the world does this movie get a 93%? I guess the formula is as long as you have an exciting chase seen at the end that's all people will remember. The is no gravitas to the movies since Disney took over. There are practically no storylines.   Most of this movie revolves around chasing the rebels\, and stuff on Luke's island that are of no consequence at all. The writers don't 'get' Star Wars like Lucas did. It's a shame. The magic is gone.
